markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Vengeful Arm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1809)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 305</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Followers of Abraxas from Nex have access to this tattoo.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=71) teaches that an eye for an eye is the basis of law. This tattoo of a coiled viper provides a +1 item bonus to [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) checks.

<document level="2" id="action-1469" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
